title: Write comprehensive tests
description:
Create a comprehensive test suite for the Todo API.

Test coverage needed:
- Unit tests for data store functions
- Integration tests for all API endpoints
- Edge case testing (invalid IDs, malformed data)
- Error scenario testing

Test scenarios:
- Create todo with valid data
- Create todo with invalid data
- Get all todos (empty and populated)
- Get single todo (exists and not found)
- Update todo (valid and invalid)
- Delete todo (exists and not found)
- Validation error cases

Acceptance Criteria:
- Jest configured and working
- Test coverage ≥80%
- All tests pass
- Tests can be run with npm test

blockers.description: Requires all phase-1 tasks to be completed
